Social Host.definition: a person who furnishes another with alcohol in a social setting and not as a licensed vendor [courts…reluctant to impose liability on social hosts based on…negligence principles alone
Social Host.origin: [courts…reluctant to impose liability on social hosts based on…negligence principles alone, without the support of express legislative policy " Ferreira v. Strack , 652 A.2d 965 (1995)"]
